  • Uses of EntityInstanceEvent in net.minestom.server.event.entity

    Classes in net.minestom.server.event.entity that implement EntityInstanceEvent
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    EntityAttackEvent
    Called when a player does a left click on an entity or with EntityCreature.attack(Entity).
    class 
    EntityDamageEvent
    Called with LivingEntity.damage(DamageType, float).
    class 
    EntityDeathEvent
     
    class 
    EntityDespawnEvent
    Called right before an entity is removed
    class 
    EntityFireEvent
     
    class 
    EntityItemMergeEvent
    Called when two ItemEntity are merging their ItemStack together to form a sole entity.
    class 
    EntityPotionAddEvent
     
    class 
    EntityPotionRemoveEvent
     
    class 
    EntityShootEvent
    Called with EntityProjectile.shoot(Point, double, double)
    class 
    EntitySpawnEvent
    Called when a new instance is set for an entity.
    class 
    EntityTickEvent
    Called when an entity ticks itself.
    class 
    EntityVelocityEvent
    Called when a velocity is applied to an entity using Entity.setVelocity(Vec).

  • Uses of EntityInstanceEvent in net.minestom.server.event.inventory

    Classes in net.minestom.server.event.inventory that implement EntityInstanceEvent
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    InventoryClickEvent
    Called after InventoryPreClickEvent, this event cannot be cancelled and items related to the click are already moved.
    class 
    InventoryCloseEvent
    Called when an Inventory is closed by a player.
    class 
    InventoryOpenEvent
    Called when a player open an Inventory.
    class 
    InventoryPreClickEvent
    Called before InventoryClickEvent, used to potentially cancel the click.
    class 
    PlayerInventoryItemChangeEvent
    Called when AbstractInventory.safeItemInsert(int, ItemStack) is being invoked on a PlayerInventory.

  • Uses of EntityInstanceEvent in net.minestom.server.event.player

    Classes in net.minestom.server.event.player that implement EntityInstanceEvent
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AdvancementTabEvent
    Called when a Player opens the advancement screens or switch the tab and when he closes the screen.
    class 
    PlayerBlockBreakEvent
     
    class 
    PlayerBlockInteractEvent
    Called when a player interacts with a block (right-click).
    class 
    PlayerBlockPlaceEvent
    Called when a player tries placing a block.
    class 
    PlayerCancelDiggingEvent
    Called when a Player stops digging a block before it is broken
    class 
    PlayerChangeHeldSlotEvent
    Called when a player change his held slot (by pressing 1-9 keys).
    class 
    PlayerChatEvent
    Called every time a Player write and send something in the chat.
    class 
    PlayerChunkLoadEvent
    Called when a player receive a new chunk data.
    class 
    PlayerChunkUnloadEvent
    Called after a chunk being unload to a certain player.
    class 
    PlayerCommandEvent
    Called every time a player send a message starting by '/'.
    class 
    PlayerDeathEvent
    Called when a player die in Player.kill().
    class 
    PlayerDisconnectEvent
    Called when a player disconnect.
    class 
    PlayerEatEvent
    Called when a player is finished eating.
    class 
    PlayerEntityInteractEvent
    Called when a Player interacts (right-click) with an Entity.
    class 
    PlayerFinishDiggingEvent
    Called when a Player successfully finishes digging a block
    class 
    PlayerGameModeChangeEvent
    Called when the gamemode of a player is being modified.
    class 
    PlayerHandAnimationEvent
    Called when the player swings his hand.
    class 
    PlayerItemAnimationEvent
    Used when a Player finish the animation of an item.
    class 
    PlayerMoveEvent
    Called when a player is modifying his position.
    class 
    PlayerPacketEvent
     
    class 
    PlayerPluginMessageEvent
    Called when a player send ClientPluginMessagePacket.
    class 
    PlayerPreEatEvent
    Called before the PlayerEatEvent and can be used to change the eating time or to cancel its processing, cancelling the event means that the player will continue the animation indefinitely.
    class 
    PlayerStartDiggingEvent
    Called when a Player start digging a block, can be used to forbid the Player from mining it.
    class 
    PlayerStartFlyingEvent
    Called when a player start flying.
    class 
    PlayerStartFlyingWithElytraEvent
     
    class 
    PlayerStartSneakingEvent
    Called when a player starts sneaking.
    class 
    PlayerStartSprintingEvent
    Called when a player starts sprinting.
    class 
    PlayerStopFlyingEvent
    Called when a player stop flying.
    class 
    PlayerStopFlyingWithElytraEvent
     
    class 
    PlayerStopSneakingEvent
    Called when a player stops sneaking.
    class 
    PlayerStopSprintingEvent
    Called when a player stops sprinting.
    class 
    PlayerSwapItemEvent
    Called when a player is trying to swap his main and off hand item.
    class 
    PlayerTickEvent
    Called at each player tick.
    class 
    PlayerUseItemEvent
    Event when an item is used without clicking on a block.
    class 
    PlayerUseItemOnBlockEvent
    Used when a player is clicking on a block with an item (but is not a block in item form).

    PlayerInstanceEvent
